name: Vancasso Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven, Non Stick Coating. All Heat Source
description: 【One Pot for Multiple Use - Suitable for Families of 3-5 People】
This 6-Quart vancasso enameled cast iron dutch oven is great for beginners or pros.
It is resistant to acidic and alkaline substances, and you can use it to marinate food before cooking (prepare, cook, and serve food in the same pot).
Safe for braising, simmering, baking, broiling, and roasting on gas, electric, ceramic, glass top, and induction stoves (not including microwave ovens); oven safe to 500°F.

name: Cooking pots Metal Utensil Oven & Dishwasher Safe, 100% Toxin Free
description: Easy Cleanup: The revolutionary Gotham Steel finish allows for an effortless wipe down after using and is completely dishwasher safe allowing you to simply throw your stock pot in the dishwasher after using for a quick cleanup experience.

Ultra-Nonstick: Get healthier food, easy food release, and quick cleanup with Gotham Steel’s award winning ceramic nonstick coating- The stock pot is generously coated 3x with a healthy ceramic nonstick coating, ensuring foods and sticky sauces don’t stick to your pot while using, without any butters or oils need, for years to come.

Quick and Even Cooking: The Gotham Steel stock pot features a solid aluminum composition and a spiralized base, quickly, and evenly conducting heat throughout the entire pot, ensuring there are no dead zones or hot spots, providing deliciously and perfectly cooked foods daily.

Oven & Stovetop Safe: Gotham Steel cookware is oven safe up to 500 degrees and compatible with all types of stovetops- Gas, electric, halogen & ceramic, besides induction  allowing you to cook virtually anywhere you'd like.

name: Cooking Pans Dishwasher Safe Cookware, 11-Inch, 4.4-Quart Capacity, Terracotta
description: CUT DOWN KITCHEN CLUTTER: Goodful’s All in One 11-inch deep dish nonstick pan can replace your bulky kitchen cookware sets. The multi-functional pan can be used as a frying pan, saute pan, sauce pan, stockpot, wok pan, skillet, and braiser. Includes lid and beechwood turner.

HEALTHIER NONSTICK COOKING: This pan features a durable, high-performance, long-lasting, multilayer non-stick coating that allows food to easily slides out of the pan without adding extra oils. The coating is manufactured without PFOA, lead, cadium, toxic metals, or nanoparticles.

HEAVY-DUTY BUT LIGHTWEIGHT: Although heavy-duty, the anti-warp, thick cast aluminum is light enough to maneuver in the kitchen. It is much lighter than cast iron skillets, or cast iron dutch ovens. Offers durability, even heat distribution, and superior performance with all culinary creations.

MULTI STYLE COOKING OPTIONS: Pan fry, sauté, sear, boil, simmer, blanche, braise, poach, deep fry, stew and then serve in style. No matter what you’re cooking, this pan is always up for the task. Also compatible with all cooktops: electric, gas, glass, or induction cooktop.

name: Frying Pans  Set 8, 10.25, 12 Inch Oven Safe 400F, Lid Safe 350F Cookware
description: Premium Design: Effortlessly prepare a wide range of recipes and enjoy the benefits of easy cleaning, perfect preheating, deep vessel shapes, comfortable handling, and superior heat distribution in one exceptional cookware set.

Durable Construction: The hard anodized exterior and forged design is built to stand the test of time. Titanium Non-stick coating keeps food sliding smoothly, making cooking easier and cleanup a breeze
Thermo-Spot Technology: Unique heat indicator turns solid red when pans are properly preheated so you'll know exactly when to start cooking for perfect results every time.

Comfortable Handles: Riveted silicone handles provide a comfortable and secure grip. Whether cooking a favorite recipe or an experimental new dish, this collection is tough enough to take on all your cooking needs.

Versatile Cooking Options: This set can withstand oven temperatures up to 400°F (lids up to 350°F) and is suitable for all stove tops, excluding induction, making it a versatile and reliable addition to your kitchen. Limited lifetime warranty.

name: Cookware Sets 17 Piece Oven Safe 400F, Lid Safe 350F Pots and Pans
description: Set includes: 8, 10 and 11,5 inch fry pan, 11.5 inch lid, 10.25 inch square griddle, 1 quart saucepan with lid, 2 and 3 quart saucepan with lids, 3.5 quart deep sauté pan with lid, 5 quart dutch oven with lid, 3 quart steamer insert, and a 1 egg fry pan.

Durable Construction: The hard anodized exterior and forged design is built to stand the test of time. Titanium Non-stick coating keeps food sliding smoothly, making cooking easier and cleanup a breeze.
Thermo-Spot Technology: Unique heat indicator turns solid red when pans are properly preheated so you'll know exactly when to start cooking for perfect results every time.
Premium Design: Riveted silicone handles provide a comfortable grip, while the vented tempered glass lids trap heat and moisture while maintaining visibility.

Versatile Cooking Options: This set can withstand oven temperatures up to 400°F (lids up to 350°F) and is suitable for all stove tops, excluding induction, making it a versatile and reliable addition to your kitchen. Limited lifetime warranty.

name: Handis Prestige Deluxe Stainless Steel Mini Handi Pressure Cooker, 3.3-Liter
description: Prestige stainless steel cookers use the best quality stainless steel with stronger lugs and thick base to give your cooker a safe and long life
Comes with a first time 2-in-1 safety device called pi pressure indicator ; The device will rise while there is pressure inside the cooker and will come down when there is no pressure thus indicating
Designed to give you more body capacity as compared to normal outer lid pressure cooker
Enables "separator cooking" , a more hygienic form of cooking to retain the nutritional value and taste of food while enabling you to cook 3 dishes at a time
ISI certified - conforms to international quality standards

name: Kadais Duty Copper Bowl Kadai, Food Grade Copper & Steel
description: DEEP & HEAVY DESIGN: This set of copper and stainless steel Indian kadai with copper bottom is constructed using high-quality materials for lasting durability. The kadhai has a smooth glossy finish inside and out that can also prevent scratches.

MULTIPURPOSE: This kadai set is truly versatile; it has a diameter of 5 inches with a deep bottom to serve your delicious meals perfectly. You can use the kadai in many ways for serving amazing dishes every day.
BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED UTENSIL: A serving kadai that is meticulously designed and visually appealing.

COMBINATION OF COPPER AND STAINLESS STEEL MATERIALS: The kadai is made with a blend of copper and stainless steel, combining the elegance of copper with the durability and functionality of stainless steel.
ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED HANDLES: The handles are designed to be ergonomic, ensuring a secure and comfortable grip while carrying and serving the kadai.

THE PERFECT GIFT IDEA: Apart from offering you a versatile experience, you can use this classy-looking set as a gift on any occasion. Any cooking enthusiast would love to have this set. It will truly be a thoughtful present for your loved ones.

name: Nuwave Cast Iron Grill, 12.42”x10.21” Non-Stick Grilling Surface, Stay-Cool Silicone Handles
description: HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION - The Cast Iron Grill is heavy-duty, built from premium quality cast iron that will provide a lifetime of use. It is oven safe and great for stovetop, BBQ, campfire, and smoker. Get the outdoor char and grilled flavors indoors.

PREMIUM MATERIAL - This Grill is made from premium cast iron used by the best chefs in the world. The Cast Iron Grill can withstand over 800°F and is an excellent conductor and retainer of heat. These properties make it an excellent surface for grilling.

TRUE GRILL FLAVORS - Cast Iron Grill is constructed with side walls, wide cooking surface, and deep grill ridges. Your steaks, chicken breasts, burgers, salmon, and vegetables will have the proper char, sear, grill marks, and the flavors you love.

WORKS ON ALL COOKTOPS & OVEN SAFE - The Cast Iron Grill is safe for use on all cooktops including electric and gas stoves, charcoal and gas grills, smokers, and even over fire. It is oven-safe up to 800°F for seamless transition from stove to oven.

name: Vinod Flat Non-Stick Multi Tawa, 13 inch (Crepe Pan/Griddle)
description: Thick 4 mm 100% Virgin aluminium ensures even heat distribution which ensures the food does not burn
Triple layered with Swiss technology, scratch-proof non-stick coating. Metal spoon friendly.
PFOA Free, which ensures fully non toxic coatings. You can enjoy food absolutely worry free
Triple riveted handles which ensures handles don’t get loose over long period of time
Stay-cool Bakelite handles which are Ideal, heat resistant and designed to fit the curve of your palm

name: EXCELSTEEL Non Stick Rust Resistant Breakfast Brunch Induction Cooktop Egg Poacher, 6 Cup
description: Easy To Use, Easy To Cleanup: Take the strain out of poaching the perfect egg for breakfast or brunch with Excelsteel’s 6 cup egg poacher! Poaching eggs are made simple with the instructions. After creating an appetizing meal, cleanup is made is easy with the non-stick egg cups. All parts are dishwasher safe.
Durable & Long Lasting: Designed with an encapsulated base, a riveted handle, and rust-resistant stainless steel to ensure durability, reliability, and everyday long-lasting use in the kitchen.
Delicious Breakfast & Brunch: Impress friends and family with a wonderfully cooked weekend brunch! Create delicious meals such as eggs Benedict, toasted English ham muffin, or a light morning snack.
Multi-Purpose Use: Doubles as a regular fry pan so you can be more efficient and versatile in the kitchen. Get back to cooking to create a wider selection of foods without needing a 2nd pan.

name: 295L Solid Door Hybrid Chest Freezer
description: This easy-to-use chest freezer by Husky offers great freezing functionality and efficiency for any home environment. It features a removable storage basket and digital temperature control with a digital display all combined with a large 295L gross capacity to ensure adequate space and size.
Food Safe: Suitable for storing food, dairy and other perishables making this idea for studio apartments and small kitchens
Hybrid cooling functionality offers the capability of either freezing or refrigerating at any one time.
Internal light inside the door provides additional visibility within the cavity. The light only switches on when the door opens to provide improved energy efficiency.
A removable storage basket provides additional functionality and improved access to the chest freezer
High-temperature alarm to alert you to changes in the internal temperature of the freezer
Digital temperature controller and display makes managing the internal temperature very simple and easy
Fast freeze functionality

You control coffee's flavor & temperature with 5 brew strengths & 2 heat settings
Includes cone filter samples and water filter pack

Homemade ice cream ready in as little as 20 minutes — no rock salt or hand churning needed
Makes ice cream, frozen yogurt, custard, sorbet or gelato
Easy to use — make ice cream in 3 simple steps

name: Hamilton Beach Professional Professional 2 Slice Toaster
description: 2 DEEP, WIDE SLOTS: 2 slice toaster has large slots to easily fit bagels, artisan and homemade breads, in addition to smaller favorites like frozen waffles and English muffins.

PRO FUNCTIONS: Toaster has a bagel function toasts only one side of a cut bagel while warming the other. Defrost is ideal for toasting frozen breakfast favorites, like waffles. The reheat setting warms breads for an additional 30 seconds.
STAINLESS STEEL TOASTER: Modern stainless steel exterior is durable, easy to wipe down and looks great on countertops.
TOAST BOOST: The toaster has a toast boost feature that lifts foods a little higher when you need it for easy removal, great for smaller items like English muffins.
CRUMB TRAY: The 2 slice toaster features a convenient crumb tray that easily slides out, making cleanup simple.

name: THERMOS Stainless King Vacuum-Insulated Food Jar, 24 Ounce, Matte Steel
description: STAYS HOT OR COLD: THERMOS vacuum insulation technology for max temperature retention of hot or cold meals. Keeps the weather out and the delicious in. Soups stay hot for up to 14 hours and cold foods stay cold up to 24 hours
EXTREMELY DURABLE: High quality 18/8 stainless steel construction is dependable any time of the year, from lunch on-the-go to camping in the wilderness
SWEAT-PROOF: Exterior stays cools to the touch with hot contents and sweat-proof with cold. THERMOS brand food jars are dishwasher safe, top rack recommended
BUILT IN SERVING BOWL: The insulated lid doubles as a built-in serving bowl. The lid is leak proof when closed
OTHER CAPACITIES: Love the food jar but looking for a different size? The STAINLESS KING food jar also comes in a 16 ounce and 47 ounce capacity

name: Stanley Legendary Classic Canteen Water
description: MAKE A STATEMENT: Urban-inspired good looks with a signature Stanley touch. We’ve taken a classic military canteen silhouette, given it a modern spin, and created a 1.1 quart water canteen you’ll want to flaunt. Pick your favorite color, head out on your next adventure, and brace yourself for compliments.

CRAFTED TO ENDURE: Whatever you throw at it, this metal canteen will take it. No surprise really, it’s a Stanley after all. Our stylish canteen is made of 18/8 stainless steel to act as a trusty companion as you hike, camp out, or navigate the urban jungle.

NO MESSY LEAKS: Out in the wild, there are a lot of things to think about. Luckily, a leaky stainless steel canteen won’t be one of them. Thanks to the leakproof lid, your precious water remains contained as you explore & experience.

DISHWASHER SAFE: Cleaning your canteen will be easy - just pop it into the dishwasher. It’s also simple to wash it by hand when away from home. And as you hydrate after a long trek, successful fishing trip, or intense climb, the BPA-free design will punctuate each sip with confidence.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: Since 1913 we’ve promised to provide rugged, capable gear for food and drink - accessories built to last a lifetime. It’s a promise we still keep. Stanley products purchased from Stanley come with a lifetime warranty. Rest easy knowing we’ve got your back through it all.

sugar jar,salt and pepper container,candy Jar and more.

name: Reusable Silicone Food Storage Bag Set of 3 - Large Size 50 OZ
description: 2 LARGE HERMETIC PRODUCE SAVER BAGS 50 OZ/1.5L/6 cups to store family portions & meal prep; 1 SMALL BAG 30 OZ/1L/4 cups for snacks, fruits, veggies, sandwiches.

Our SOUS VIDE BAGS are made of SAFE ECO FRIENDLY & CERTIFIED FOOD GRADE SILICONE which contains NO BPA, NO BPS, NO BPF, NO PVC, NO Phthalates, NO Petroleum, is Plastic Free & Latex Free. Sealing bars are intended to move TIGHT on and off the silicon for AIRTIGHT & LEAKPROOF seal.
Pack your food into thick AIRTIGHT SILICONE FOOD STORAGE BAGS at the store, refrigerate or freeze, marinade, microwave or boil, reheat, eat out of & save leftovers for lunch at work.

REUSABLE FREEZER BAGS are flexible, strong & washable. Reuse them for many years. Hermetically sealed closure preserves the freshness of your food for healthy nutrition, money saving & less food waste.
WARRANTY only available from AUTHORIZED SELLER KIVA.WORLD! Kiva.World helps alleviate daily household duties and free up time for happy families. MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!

name: Maelstrom Lunch Box for Men, Insulated Lunch Bag
description: leek - Maelstrom Foodie Buds Are An Ultra-Light Lunch Bag Weighing Only 1.0Lb, That Takes Less Space While Still Providing Plenty Of Volume15L. The Specially Designed Skeleton Structure And The Four Sides Stitched Lining Keeps The Lunch Bag Standing Upright Even After Being Folded Flat For A Long-Time. It's A Perfect Lunch Bag For Work, Business Trips, and daily travel.

Advanced Thermal Efficiency - Thoughtful Five Layer Insulation Design. Exterior Surfaces Are Made Of Rip-Stop Nylon Fabric Plus One Layer Of Waterproof Pvc. Interior Layers Are Thicker, Reinforced Food-Grade Peva Materials With Seamless Ultrasonic Welding For 100% Leak-Proof And Tear-Resistance. A Built-In 5Mm Epe Foam Middle Layer And 210D Liner Add Additional Insulation, Allowing The Maelstrom Foodie Buds To Keep Food Cold/Warm Until It's Time to dig in.

Durability - Is An Outstanding Feature Of The Foodie Buds. The Reinforced Zipper With An Attractive Tail Rope Is Not Going To Get Stuck, And Is Easier To Open And Close. The Webbing And A Padded Handle Are Thoroughly Stitched Together, Which Is Tear-Proof And Comfortable To Carry Without Strangling Your Hand. The Lunch Bag Is Equipped With A Detachable And Adjustable Long Shoulder Strap, Giving You Two Options To Comfortably carry the bag.

Unique Design - Maelstrom Designed An Insulated Front Pocket. The Inside Of The Front Pocket Is Made Of Food-Grade Thick Aluminum Foil, Sewn With One Elastic Band To Hold Cutlery, And Four Little Foil Pockets Are Sewn For Knives And Forks. It Is Specially Designed To Put Oily Tableware In To Clean Later. Very Useful And Cleanable.

MULTI-POCKETS - Main compartment is used for lunch, bread, etc. The top layer is more suitable for storing fruits, cakes, salad, or drinks. The Maelstrom portable lunch bag is equipped with one front pocket for storing dirty tableware, and two mesh side pockets to stash extra snacks. One of them is specially zipped to hold small items. One mesh pocket on the cover of the bag can hold disposable tableware and towels, and finally one large pocket on the back to hold plates and napkins.
